name: dna-trans
desc: This website is being built for a private, small business. The client expressed interest in increasing their search engine ranking to bring in more business online.
features: OAuth authentication system built using Redux and JWT

name: burger-eater
desc: A different take on the todo list app built on a Node/SQL back-end. One thing that was fun/unique here was that I put together a simple ORM rather than use Sequelize.

name: date-night
desc: A web application that combines API calls from Yelp, Eventbrite and Google places to provide a 'one stop shop' evening itinerary creator for the user.

name: chrono-cards
desc: A React built browser game where the user must avoid clicking the same card twice in a row.
